document.discussion_title: Interview with Andrey Polyakov, the New President of the World Diamond Council
document.topic_text: Interview with Andrey Polyakov, the New President of the World Diamond Council proves that the WDC only seeks to make diamond trade efficient. In no way do they combat the negative effects of the diamond industry. African people will continue to suffer and pointless organisations will continually pop to protect this order. Link:
document.post: Interview with Andrey Polyakov, the New President of the World Diamond Council proves that the WDC only seeks to make diamond trade efficient. In no way do they combat the negative effects of the diamond industry. African people will continue to suffer and pointless organisations will continually pop to protect this order. Link:
